name: Repoli Piero
description: Life is simple folks make it complicated. Take time to stop and smell the roses. Do what you like when you like as long as it doesn’t hurt anyone else. Think about the feelings of others and know it’s your for the taking. Work hard, play harder love the hardest. Love is possible listen and compromise. Get out and vote…it will count and does make a difference. Take some time and pay it forward..do a random act of kindness weekly.I Seek Someone Open and Outgoing.
